_description: Envoy at the end of a Commentary on the Psalter — three 8-line stanzas

NLS1885.First Lines:
Goo litle book of commendacionI pray to god that right wele must
                    thowe spede…
NLS1885.Last Lines:
…shewyng howe goddes lawe shall yeue theym meedeIn euer
                    lastyng blisse where that rest is
NLS1885.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Secular Lyrics of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: 97.
